alert.note: Alert for Indian River; Northern Brevard County; Southern Brevard County; St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 23 at 9:57AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Patchy Frost Possible in Wind Sheltered Locations Late Tonight in Brevard, Indian River, and Saint Lucie Counties... Temperatures are expected to drop into the middle 30s across mainland Brevard County, and upper 30s in Indian River and Saint Lucie Counties late tonight through Monday morning. Northwest winds around 5 mph will prevent widespread frost from developing along the coast, however patchy frost is possible in any location that is sheltered from the wind. The frost threat is greatest in Brevard County for areas west of U.S. Highway 1, and in Indian River and Saint Lucie counties for areas west of Interstate 95. Cold sensitive plants may need to be covered or brought indoors. Be extra cautious if using space heaters and keep them well away from combustible material such as pillows, blankets, and curtains.

area.areaDesc: Indian River; Northern Brevard County; Southern Brevard County; St. Lucie
